summary: In 2019, the Department of Veterans Affairs updated its process for reviewing appointment requests for specialty health care, such as cardiology. VA facilities set up dedicated teams to review appointment requests and contact veterans about their scheduling options, e.g., letting them know they can see a health care provider in their community if they can't access a VA facility. title: Veterans Health Care: Referral Coordination Initiative for Specialty Care Needs Improved Program Direction and Guidance
